common.coreFeaturesDesc: 让您的项目更轻松的核心特性

slogan.description: AI生成可视化原型设计和编辑平台，支持2D，3D模型，结合LLM(Large Language Model) 快速编辑。

feature.title: AI生成2D图形
feature.details: 基于可视化模型生成各种2D图形

feature.title: AI生成3D场景
feature.details: 基于可视化模型生成各种3D场景

feature.title: 多种数据源
feature.details: 数据源插件与提示词结合

feature.title: 三方插件机器人
feature.details: 为了提供更好服务，支持插件机器人，例如Huggingface space

feature.title: 可视化模型
feature.details: 为了更好生成可视化图形，自研可视化模型

feature.title: 容器化部署
feature.details: 为了快速使用，支持容器化部署

honor.description: 我们获得了些殊荣，这些荣誉属于所有为 SolidUI 做出贡献的人，感谢您的付出！

common.coreFeaturesDesc: Modern features that will make your project easier.

slogan.description: AI-generated visualization prototyping and editing platform, support 2D, 3D models, combined with LLM(Large Language Model) for quick editing.

feature.title: AI generated 2D graphics
feature.details: Generate various 2D graphics based on the visualization model

feature.title: AI generated 3D scene
feature.details: Generate various 3D scenes based on the visualization model

feature.title: Multiple data sources
feature.details: Data source plugin combined with prompt words

feature.title: Three-party plug-in robot
feature.details: In order to provide better service, support plug-in robots, such as Huggingface space

feature.title: Visualization Model
feature.details: In order to better generate visualization graphics, self-developed visualization model

feature.title: Containerized Deployment
feature.details: For quick use, support containerized deployment

honor.description: We have received some precious honors, which belong to everyone who contributes to SolidUI, Thanks
